page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {RESULTS OF EMPLOYMENT SURVEY} {20% of replies worked in factories,18% {office workers,}9% in construction,5% worked in connection with transport,4% were employed by the Health Service,4% were in Domestic Employment,3% in finance related employment,{31% in {other types of employment}such as Police,Services,Agriculture or were retired,and{5% were unemployed.}Of those in employment most people worked an{8 hour day for 5 days a week,}about 4% worked over 10 hours a day (these were those involved with the Health Service or in finance) and 4% worked under 4 hours a day (those in Domestic Employment).On an average most people spent{under 30 minutes travelling to {work}but 2 people spent over 2 hours. {70% travelled by car,}10% cycled,8% by motorcycle or moped,5% by bus,5% walked,2% by train.
